author: The B1M
description:
Portland International has had a $2BN facelift.
To try everything Brilliant has to offer for free for a full 30 days, visit ﻿https://brilliant.org/TheB1M/﻿ and you’ll also get 20% off an annual premium subscription.

Full story here - https://www.theb1m.com/video/america-has-finally-built-a-beautiful-airport

This video contains paid promotion for Brilliant.

Additional footage and images courtesy of Port of Portland, Skanska, Blacktupelo, KGW News, Tony Webster and Matt from London.

Thank you to Port of Portland and Skanska for information they provided. Further research sources:
- https://www.orartswatch.org/pdx-airports-2-billion-reinvention-takes-flight/
- https://www.designboom.com/architecture/zgf-pdx-portland-airport-main-terminal-mass-timber-oregon-08-14-2024/
- https://cdn.portofportland.com/pdfs/PDXNext-fact-sheet.pdf
- https://katu.com/news/local/city-of-portland-prepares-for-earthquake-response-pbot-water-bull-run-bridges-multnomah-county-oregon-cascadia-subduction-zone#
title: America Has Finally Built a Beautiful Airport

author: The B1M
title: America Has FINALLY Built a Beautiful Airport
